events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived and the tracking information hasn't been updated for days.
The customer's issue was identified as a delivery delay due to lack of recent tracking updates and late shipment.
The case was assigned to delivery support agent John Smith to handle the customer's delay complaint.
Hello! I'm John from customer support. I'm sorry to hear about the delay with your order. I will help you resolve this.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can check the shipping status more thoroughly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the shipping address is 45 Maple Street, Springfield, IL.
Thank you for the details. I've contacted the shipping carrier and expedited your delivery. You should receive it within 3 days.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate you speeding up the delivery. Looking forward to receiving the package soon.
The issue has been marked resolved after confirming the new estimated delivery date with the customer.
Just following up to ensure your package has arrived and everything is in order. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
